attributes.additional_details:
To retain and motivate rather than using the excuse Nurses are vocational.

It's time change is made and the government "step up to the plate"
attributes.background:
With the catistrofic situation we are in we NEED Nurses to administer the Vaccine, this must not be done off the back of them being vocational or clapping on a Thursday night. 
The nurses need to be motivated and completely reviewed as Police were in 1980s re Mining).

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560253

If you want the Government to take an action different to the above, you could start a new petition requesting this, but it would need to be clear exactly what you want the Government to do.
